game.name: Fidgetiocom
game.description:
The entire world looks crazy for the fidget and we are pretty sure that you would not like miss it out an opportunity if you get a chance to play it with your favorite gadget in the virtual world. Today we have got covered with a brand new arcade game in which you can pass your time with your favorite gadget and spin it and have fun in a wonderful friendly environment. Hey friends! This fidget spinning is very rewarding. Your job is to spin it and grow bigger and show off the world that you are skilled enough to conquer the largest territory.

When you click the play button, you would spot a fidget that needs your instructions for spinning. Click or tap the screen to make it spin and create your own score in this HTML5 fidget game! Be careful as your enemy fidgets will also be there to stop you from surviving in this world! Try to collect score and increase the power of your spinner! You can also dash into the nearest spinner to destroy them when you reach a safe amount of spin power.

When the game ends, you would see on the screen your spin speed, how many enemies you have killed and your survival time. Feel free to share your accomplishments with your friends and family! Good luck to explore this awesome online world and become a best fidget player! We maintain a wide range of quality free arcade games that include different colored fidget and its related activities. Enjoy this great amount of fun without download!
